libICEpost.src.base
===================

.. py:module:: libICEpost.src.base

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   @author: F. Ramognino       <federico.ramognino@polimi.it>
   Last update:        9/03/2023

   Basic functions and classes or data-structures that are useful for the overall package

   Content of the package
       Functions (package)
           Package with useful functions for:
               -> Type checking
               -> Management of dictionaries
               -> Error handling and displaying warnings
               -> Handling OpenFOAM files and data-structures

       Tables (package)
           Table-like data structures (lookup tables, OpenFOAM tabulations)

       Utilities
           Defines class Utilities which wraps all usefull functions defined in 'Functions' pakage

-----------
